card_text: When your opponent activates a monster effect on the field: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card, then, you can apply the following effect.$N‚óèBanish 1 monster from your hand, and if you do, Special Summon the monster that was destroyed and sent to the GY by this effect to your field, but negate its effects.$NYou can only activate 1 "Draco-Utopian Aura" per turn.
